titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. William Jones and Budd Jones, Indictment
CWG0900

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1863-1867

body.p:
Russell Circuit Court
The commonwealth of Kentucky
Against
Wilson Jones & Budd Jones
The Grand Jury of Russell County, Empaneled, charged and sworn in the name and by the authority of The commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Wilson Jones & Budd Jones of the crime of murder

Committed as follows Viz. The said Wilson Jones & Budd Jones did on the 10th day of February 1863 in the County aforesaid unlawfully, wilfully wickedly feloniously and with Malice aforethought Kill and Murder one Lewis Higgenbottom with a pistol Loaded with a Leaden ball, against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

M H Owsley
Attorney for The Commonwealth

A copy attest. A P. Simpson Clerk R C C
By Achilles Nelson D C.

1863. Nov 5th filed
Att Geo. Bryan CK
a copy attest
A P. Simpson Ck
By. Achilles Nelson D C

Commonwealth
vs } Indictment Murder
Wilson Jones & Budd Jones
A True Bill
Green B Selby.
Foreman
Witnesses Examined
Polly Ann Hays
Isaac G Shull
a copy attest A P Simpson clk
By Achilles Nelson D C
